short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Lacak riwayat harga di Tokopedia dan dapatkan notifikasi penurunan harga
short.en: Track price history on Tokopedia and get price drop alert

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Fitur utama:
1. Pintasan praktis dan pencarian cepat.
2. Riwayat harga: Anda dapat memeriksa riwayat harga produk apa pun di halaman produk.
3. Peringatan penurunan harga: Tambahkan produk ke favorit Anda dan Anda akan menerima pemberitahuan ketika harganya turun.
4. Cari berdasarkan gambar: temukan lebih banyak produk serupa atau sama di 1688, Taobao, dll.
5. Copy link produk, copy judul produk, cari judul di 1688 dan Taobao.

Tokopedia adalah merek dagang dari Tokopedia.com, Inc. Ekstensi ini tidak dibuat atau didukung oleh Tokopedia.

Jika Anda memiliki pertanyaan atau saran, jangan ragu untuk menghubungi kami:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact
long.en:
Main features:
1. Convenient shortcuts and quick search.
2. Price history: You can check any product price history on the product page.
3. Price drop alert: Add the products to your favorites and you will receive notification when its price drops.
4. Search by image: find more similar or same products on 1688, Taobao etc.
5. Copy product link, copy product title, search title on 1688 and Taobao.

Tokopedia is a trademark of Tokopedia.com, Inc. This extension was not created or endorsed by Tokopedia.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact
By installing the AliPrice extension, you accept the terms of the "AliPrice Terms of Service" and allow the extension to redirect to affiliate program links, including Tokopedia and other programs. AliPrice Terms of Service - https://www.aliprice.com/information/index/page/term_of_use
